msoc_contrib.label: Who contributed to answering these questions?

value_labels.2: I (The participant) and study partner together

msoc_confid.label: The following question is for the study partner. On average, how confident are you that your answers to the questions in this survey accurately reflect the participant's experience?

value_labels.1: Not at all (not confident in any of the answers)
value_labels.2: Not very (confident in less than half of the answers)
value_labels.3: Moderately (confident in about half of the answers)
value_labels.4: Confident (confident in most of the answers)
value_labels.5: Very confident (confident in all of the answers)

msoc_contrib_ppt.label: How much did you (the participant) contribute to completing this survey?

value_labels.1: I (the participant) answered all of the questions with no input from others
value_labels.2: I (the participant) answered most of the questions with no input from others
value_labels.3: I (the participant) answered about half of the questions
value_labels.4: I (the participant) answered less than half of the questions
